title: Lec 10: Problems arising due to modern agricultural practices #CH24SP #swayamprabha

tasks.task: Attend a lecture on modern farmingallenges and traditional knowledge.
subtasks: Sit and listen to the lecturer.
Recall past lectures related to agriculture.
Understand the importance of agriculture based on natural resources.
List the problems faced by modern farming.
Discuss excessive use of fertilizers and pesticides.
Cite statistics on pesticide poisoning and deaths.
Analyze the impact of monoculture on biodiversity.
Examine the pollution caused by synthetic fertilizers.
Discuss the unsustainable use of water in agriculture.
Evaluate the effects of pesticides on the environment and health.
Compare historical fertilizer consumption with current trends.
Present data on the relationship between fertilizer use and food production.
Address the causes of farmer suicides due to increasing costs.
Consider the risks associated with genetically modified crops.
Conclude by highlighting the need for natural farming techniques.
